title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html: And yes, the Dutch deserved to lose. He who lives by the fraudulent yellow card is sent off by the fraudulent yellow card. Don’t mess with an old fox like Figo, he’ll bite you in the ass at the first opportunity and when you’re least expecting it.
content_text: And yes, the Dutch deserved to lose.  He who lives by the fraudulent yellow card is sent off by the fraudulent yellow card.  Don’t mess with an old fox like Figo, he’ll bite you in the ass at the first opportunity and when you’re least expecting it.
